title: Google calendar app with Exchange email
content:
I have a personal Gmail account and my work email uses Exchange. They're both synced to my Google App calendar. However I can only change the color of the Gmail account. 



So in the app it looks like this. Then I go to settings. 


Then I click on the d11 calendar to change the color away from the premade color it gave me. 



And no option for color change. So I'm confused if there is a certain setting somewhere that will allow me to change the color eventually or am I S.O.L. and should just use a different Calendar app?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
